document.full_text: it was hardly surprising after the turbulent year that he has endured that cam newton would be greeted by both cheers and jeers when he was named on thursday as the nfl's first pick in the annual draft.
document.title: top pick newton still aims high after overcoming bumpy road
lines_and_colors: it was hardly surprising after the turbulent year that he has endured that cam newton would be greeted by both cheers and jeers when he was named on thursday as the nfl's first pick in the annual draft.
